contentList.content: В этой коробке содержится набор ориентированного на скрытность снаряжения, созданный прославленным мастером магии Сеймордиусом. Его творения известны далеко за пределами Фаэруна благодаря своему качеству.
У Сея не было времени придумать достойное описание.
Throw a grenade, upon impact the target(s) within range need to succeed a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or are sucked into the point of impact.

Whenever the wearer deal Piercing damage, the target needs to succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or start <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> for 3 turns.

The wearer ignores the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and while standing in blood the wearer cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>.
If the target is Bleeding and the wearer does damage with this weapon the wearer gains [1].
If the target is Bleeding and the wearer does damage with this weapon the wearer lowers the target's AC by 2.
If the target is Bleeding and the wearer does damage with this weapon the wearer gains a bonus of +2 to AC.
Throw a smokebomb. It explodes dealing [1] and creates a Cloud of Darkness.
Whenever a creature deals melee damage to the wearer, that creature takes [1], and creates a surface of blood around the wearer.
Grants the wearer <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">bleeding</LSTag> creatures.

When creatures are hit with piercing damage while already bleeding, the target needs to succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Bane</LSTag> for 2 turns
The wearer ignores target's Piercing Resistances and Immunites. The wearer also gains immunity to Blind and the ability to target regardless of Darkness and Fog Clouds.
As long as it remains on a bloody surface, affected entity regains [1].
The AC of this armor is based on your armor proficiency, dex and level. If you have medium armor or heavy armor proficiency you gain extra +2 to AC. The AC increases at levels 4, 7 and 11.
At level 4 you gain +1 to AC. At level 7 you gain +1 to AC. At level 11 you gain +1 to AC.
This magical weapon grows more powerful as its wielder gains experience. The stats increase at levels 4, 7 and 11.
At level 4 you gain a +1 enchantment bonus, at level 7 the enchantment bonus increases to +2, and at level 11 the enchantment bonus increases to +3
